text: João Carlos (born May 18, 1992 in Ribeirão Pires), is a Brazilian football right-back who currently plays for Brusque.Do Porto-PE ao Cruzeiro: João Carlos relembra trajetória até chegar ao Santa ==Honours== ;Confiança *Campeonato Sergipano: 2014 ==References== ==External links== * João Carlos at Ogol * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Clube Atlético do Porto players Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Botafogo Futebol Clube (SP) players Category:Associação Desportiva Confiança players Category:Serra Talhada Futebol Clube players Category:Santa Cruz Futebol Clube players Category:Esporte Clube Cruzeiro players Category:Campinense Clube players Category:Brusque Futebol Clube players Category:Fluminense de Feira Futebol Clube players Category:Futebol Clube Cascavel players Category:Maringá Futebol Clube players Category:Floresta Esporte Clube players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Association football midfielders
